title: Find the k Value
text: 1E99 $$=$$ $${10}^{99}$$ and -1E99 $$=$$ $$-\left({10}^{99}\right)$$. Press the EE key for E. Or just use $${10}^{99}$$ instead of 1E99.

title: Explanation
text: The probability is 0.7919 that the mean excess time used is more than 20 minutes, for a sample of 80 customers who exceed their contracted time allowance.
